spec.expr: avg by (printer_address) (prusa_temp_noz{printer_address="$ip"}) or avg by (printer_address) (prusa_temperature_celsius{printer_address="$ip", printer_heated_element="tool0"})
avg by (printer_address) (prusa_temp_bed{printer_address="$ip"}) or avg by (printer_address) (prusa_temperature_celsius{printer_address="$ip", printer_heated_element="bed"})

(avg by (printer_address) (prusa_temp_bed{printer_address="$ip"}) and on(printer_address) (changes(prusa_temp_bed{printer_address="$ip"}[30s]) > 0))
or
(avg by (printer_address) (prusa_temperature_celsius{printer_address="$ip", printer_heated_element="bed"}))

(avg by (printer_address) (prusa_ttemp_bed{printer_address="$ip"}) and on(printer_address) (changes(prusa_ttemp_bed{printer_address="$ip"}[30s]) > 0))
or
(avg by (printer_address) (prusa_temperature_target_celsius{printer_address="$ip", printer_heated_element="bed"}))

spec.description: It is not known if data are correct at this moment
spec.title: Power consumption

spec.expr:
(avg by (printer_address) (prusa_temp_noz{printer_address="$ip"}) and on(printer_address) (changes(prusa_temp_noz{printer_address="$ip"}[30s]) > 0))
or
(avg by (printer_address) (prusa_temperature_celsius{printer_address="$ip", printer_heated_element="tool0"}))

(avg by (printer_address) (prusa_ttemp_noz{printer_address="$ip"}) and on(printer_address) (changes(prusa_ttemp_noz{printer_address="$ip"}[30s]) > 0))
or
(avg by (printer_address) (prusa_temperature_target_celsius{printer_address="$ip", printer_heated_element="tool0"}))
